Html:
I noticed that for both my Shred rotation and my Mangle rotation that Primal Fury is given no value when I view the "Talents" chart.

I have my fingers crossed that this is the mysterious factor that makes Rawr report significantly different results than the other published calculators/sims!
...or it could be a simple display error.

Found this bug; Rawr was just assuming crits gave 2cp, regardless of whether you have this talent. If for some reason you don't have this talent, Rawr will be giving you wrong results. However anyone'd be pretty crazy to not have Primal Fury in any feral build at all. Regardless, this is fixed for the next version.

Sorry, not the cause of the Toskk vs Rawr differences.
Glad you could track it down!
